system.description: When you have time and physical intimacy with someone — mutual intimacy like holding them in your arms, or 1-sided intimacy like they’re restrained to a table — you can read them more deeply than normal. Roll+weird.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, you inflict 1-harm (ap) upon your subject, to no benefit.

system.choices:
While you’re reading them, spend your hold to ask their player questions, 1 for 1:

  • What was your character’s lowest moment?
  • For what does your character crave forgiveness, and of whom?
  • What are your character’s secret pains?
  • In what ways are your character’s mind and soul vulnerable?
